text: usane kahaah tumapar tumhaare paalanahaar ka prakop aur krodh aa pada hai. kya tum mujhase kuchh (moortiyon ke) naamon ke vishay mein vivaad kar rahe ho, jinaka tumane tatha tumhaare poorvajon ne (poojy) naam rakha hai, jisaka koee tark (pramaan) allaah ne nahin utaara hai? to tum (prakop kee) prateeksha karo aur tumhaare saath main bhee prateeksha kar raha hoon
